channel.title: Jobs on Dogecoin Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Jobs on Dogecoin Foundation

item.title: Vacancy: Web Developer - Dogecoin Foundation
item.description: Web Developer - Dogecoin Foundation The Dogecoin Foundation is an open source not-for-profit Foundation committed to promoting the development of Dogecoin as a truely decentralised, global currency for everyday use. The Dogecoin ecosystem is made up of millions of Shibes (people) around the world and has a strong history of giving, fun memes and Doing Only Good Everyday. It is backed up by a distributed group of decentralised developers from all over the planet, collectively working toward the goal of seeing Dogecoin in use everywhere around the globe (and potentially galaxy).
